t: That's it for now. Thank you for using the tutorial table.
If you drag-and-drop the dicetray, it will be above the dice. Just select the tray and use 'to bottom' to make things right.
No, FreeBeeGee will not do the math for you. You have to add them up yourself.
To roll all dice on the tray, use Right-click -> Random on the tray. Or select the tray and press [#].
To roll a single die, use Right-click -> Random on the die. Or select the die and press [#].
Now let's roll some dice. I already added a dicetray and a few dice.
